detail_desc: Nursing dress in Tencel™ lyocell denim with a wrapover front, collar and V-neck with a concealed press-stud. Practical inner top for easier nursing access. Long sleeves with a tab and button, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Short, straight-cut coat in woven fabric with 3/4-length flounced sleeves, side pockets and no buttons. Unlined.
Short, straight-cut coat in woven fabric with 3/4-length flounced sleeves, side pockets and no buttons. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a loose-knit linen blend with a deep V-neck, dropped shoulders and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Knee-length cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and no buttons.

Sleeveless, V-neck jumpsuit in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and narrow, double, adjustable shoulder straps. Narrow elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs. Unlined.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with long sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with long sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short jacket in sturdy canvas with a fleece-lined hood with a collar, drawstring and foldable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs and a hook and loop fastening down the front. Chest pockets, flap front pockets with a hook and loop fastening, one zipped pocket concealed by the wind flap and one inner pocket with a press-stud. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining and polyester filling.

Short jacket in sturdy canvas with a fleece-lined hood with a collar, drawstring and foldable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs and a hook and loop fastening down the front. Chest pockets, flap front pockets with a hook and loop fastening, one zipped pocket concealed by the wind flap and one inner pocket with a press-stud. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining and polyester filling.

Short jacket in sturdy canvas with a fleece-lined hood with a collar, drawstring and foldable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs and a hook and loop fastening down the front. Chest pockets, flap front pockets with a hook and loop fastening, one zipped pocket concealed by the wind flap and one inner pocket with a press-stud. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining and polyester filling.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Padded, detachable hood with an elastic drawstring and a fleece-lined stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets with snow flaps, patch pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastening, and one inner pocket. Inner ribbing at the cuffs and a concealed, elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Padded, detachable hood with an elastic drawstring and a fleece-lined stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets with snow flaps, patch pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastening, and one inner pocket. Inner ribbing at the cuffs and a concealed, elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved, turtleneck dress in a soft, fine knit with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slingbacks in imitation suede and soft, transparent plastic with pointed toes, covered block heels and an elasticated heel strap. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
Mules in a cotton weave with a frill at the front. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Fabric mules with a frill at the front decorated with plastic beads. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
5-pocket trousers in cotton corduroy with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
5-pocket trousers in cotton corduroy with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
Derby shoes in imitation patent leather with lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Wide blouse in a cotton weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top with a narrow tie. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a straight hem.
Sleeveless top in sturdy, crinkled jersey with a decorative seam centre front and concealed zip at the back.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in sturdy, crinkled jersey with a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Sunglasses with narrow plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Short, lightly padded parka in washed cotton twill with a collar with a detachable faux fur trim and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Chest pockets, flap front pockets with a concealed press-stud, a concealed drawstring at the waist and hem, and a tab with a hook and loop fastener at the cuffs. Lined.

Fitted, padded jacket in woven fabric with stand-up collar and lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, an adjustable tab with press-studs at the sides and zipped side pockets. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Lined.

Long, padded jacket in woven fabric with a padded hood, stand-up collar and zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Knee-length off-the-shoulder dress in sturdy jersey with a slight sheen. Gentle V-neck at the front, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Vest tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Short, fitted dress in stretch viscose jersey with wrapover draping at the bust and long sleeves. Lined.
Flat cap in woven fabric. Lined.
Flat cap in woven fabric. Lined.
Flat cap in woven fabric. Lined.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Coat in woven fabric with a shawl collar and welt side pockets. Detachable belt with D-rings and a tab with press-studs at the cuffs. Lined.
Jacket in woven fabric with shawl lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist and jetted front pockets. Lined.

Lightly padded jacket in nylon with appliqués, with sleeves and a detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric. Ribbed stand-up collar, press-studs down the front, side pockets with press-studs and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a glittery finish, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Wrapover blouse in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. V-neck, concealed press-studs and ties at one side. Short, wide sleeves with a scalloped trim, and a scalloped neckline. Unlined.
Wrapover blouse in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. V-neck, concealed press-studs and ties at one side. Short, wide sleeves with a scalloped trim, and a scalloped neckline. Unlined.

Long-sleeved wrapover blouse in woven fabric with a shawl collar, concealed press-studs down the front and slits in the sides. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide cuffs, and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Suede trainers with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Suede trainers with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short top in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a lace trim at the top and shoulder straps. Buttons down the front and a frill trim at the hem.
Double-breasted coat in felted fabric with a collar and decorative stitching front and back. Decorative flaps at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.
Double-breasted, fitted jacket in felted fabric with a high stand-up collar, decorative stitching front and back, side pockets and a decorative tab at the cuffs. Lined.
Faux fur coat with wide notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and long, flared sleeves. Lined.
MRS MIGHETTO x H&M/BABY EXCLUSIVE. Elastic hairbands in soft cotton jersey with a decorative bow at the front and elastication at the back. One of the hairbands is patterned.
MRS MIGHETTO x H&M/BABY EXCLUSIVE. Elasticated hairband in soft cotton jersey with bendy ears.

MRS MIGHETTO x H&M/BABY EXCLUSIVE. Romper suit in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with a decorative frill at the top, press-stud on the shoulders, short sleeves and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
MRS MIGHETTO x H&M/BABY EXCLUSIVE. Scarf in patterned cotton jersey. Size 39x39 cm.
MRS MIGHETTO x H&M/BABY EXCLUSIVE. Short-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, buttons at the back of the neck and a flounce at the hem.
Fitted jacket in a textured weave with notch lapels, a hook-and-eye fastener at the front and diagonal pockets. Lined.
Top in a patterned weave with a V-neck and spaghetti straps.
V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with a gently rounded hem and long, cuffed sleeves with a covered button. Slightly longer at the back.
Nightdress in printed jersey made from a cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and a rounded hem.
Nightdress in printed jersey made from a cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and a rounded hem.
Nightdress in printed jersey made from a cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and a rounded hem.
Nightslip in soft jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, triangular lace cups with removable inserts and a lace trim under the bust.

Pyjamas in soft jersey and lace. V-neck top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, triangular lace cups with removable inserts and a lace trim under the bust. Shorts with an elasticated waist and lace trim at the hems.
Underwired lace bra with unlined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Underwired lace bra with unlined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Striped pyjamas in a soft cotton weave. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
